list_module package¶

Submodules¶

list_module.beats module¶

list_module.beats.beats(x)¶

find the duration for the sample

Parameters:

x – the input should be a list of peaks
Raises:
  • ImportError – if the module not found
  • TypeError – if the input is not a list or the input includes string
  • ValueError – if the input includes string
Returns:

return a tuple include minimum and maximum of the list
Return type:

float

list_module.collectdata module¶

list_module.collectdata.collectdata(x)¶

returns a list included time and voltage

Parameters:self (list) – list to be determined and used later
Returns:a list
Return type:list

list_module.detect module¶

list_module.detect.detect_peak(x)¶

find the peaks of the list of voltages and return peaks value and indexes

Parameters:

x – the input should be a list
Raises:
  • ImportError – if the module not found
  • TypeError – if the input is not a list or the input includes string
  • ValueError – if the input includes string
Returns:

return a tuple include minimum and maximum of the list
Return type:

(float,float)

list_module.time_beats module¶

list_module.time_beats.time_beats(x, f)¶

find the time series for a beat the first value of each row is the valid number of the time series

Parameters:
  • x – the input include information about peak index
  • f – the input include information for all time
Raises:
  • ImportError – if the module not found
  • TypeError – if the input is not a list or the input includes string
  • ValueError – if the input includes string
Returns:

return a tuple include minimum and maximum of the list
Return type:

numpy array
